cards.name: City of Tears Map
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, draw 2 cards. (Then discard this card.)

cards.name: Fury of the Fallen
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Deal 10 damage. Deals 5 additional damage for every 25% HP you are missing ( ) .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Greenpath Map
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, draw a card and gain 4 Block. (Then discard this card.)

cards.name: Hounding Glaives
cards.description: Apply 4 (6) Constricted, dealing constant damage to the target at the end of each round. Exhaust.

cards.name: Idea Instilled
cards.description:
While this card is in your hand, gain 2 Infection whenever you play another card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kingdom's Edge Map
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, draw a card and gain 1 Strength. (Then discard this card.)

cards.name: Leaf Shield
cards.description: Gain 7 (9) Block. Gain 1 (2) Plated Thorns. Exhaust.

cards.name: Light's Allure
cards.description:
If played, lose 5 (6) HP and gain 2 (3) Strength.
If not played, Heal 5 (6) and Lose 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Master Cyclone Slash
cards.description:
Deal 18 (24) damage to ALL enemies.
Increase this card's damage by 3 (6) for the rest of the combat.

cards.name: Master Dash Slash
cards.description:
Deal 18 (24) damage.
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Obsession
cards.description:
When drawn, a random card in hand costs 1 more. If that card is played another will be chosen. 
 Exhaust.

cards.name: Pure Nail's Edge
cards.description: Remove all Block from an enemy. Deal 32 (42) damage.

cards.name: Readjusting Reaction
cards.description: If the target intends to attack, Gain 8 (11) Block. Otherwise, deal 8 (11) damage.

cards.name: Slug's Hide
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) Block.
This card costs 1 less the rest of combat.

cards.name: Spore Shroom
cards.description:
At the end of each of your turns, if you have not played an Attack,
heal 2 HP and apply 1 (2) poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Stolen Soul
cards.description:
When this card is drawn, a random card in your hand is discarded.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swarmed
cards.description:
Retain.
At the end of your turn, take 1 damage for each Swarmed in hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dreamer's Lament
cards.description:
Unplayable.
The first card you play after drawing this card, costs HP equal to it's cost.

relics.name: Bank Account Key
relics.description: Whenever you enter a shop room, gain 40 gold.
relics.flavorText: "Rest assured Dearie, I'll keep your Geo safe."

relics.name: God Tamer's Beast
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, apply 3 Constricted to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: "Some hunters train beasts to join them in chasing down prey."

relics.name: Heavy Blows
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack card that cost 3 or more, gain 5 Block.

relics.name: Nailmaster's Glory
relics.description: The first time you play a card that costs 3 or more each turn, regain [E] .
relics.flavorText: "You honour me beyond words, my pupil..."

relics.name: Pale King's Idol
relics.description: At the beginning of combat, choose 1 of 20 Colorless Cards to shuffle into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Made out of a mysterious white material.

relics.name: Salubra's Blessing
relics.description: Whenever you rest, Heal equal to how many relics you have, and Gain 2 Max HP.

relics.name: Seal of the Beast
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Seal of the Teacher
relics.description: The first Skill you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Seal of the Watcher
relics.description: The first Power you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Sheo's Paintbrush
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that cost 3 or more, gain 3 strength.
relics.flavorText: "Painting, sculpting... these things bring a different kind of pleasure."

relics.name: Soul Vessel
relics.description: Right click to gain [E] . To recharge: end a turn with [E] remaining.
relics.flavorText: A complete vessel, imbued with the power to contain soul.

relics.name: Stag's Empty Egg
relics.description: Right-Click to Stun ALL enemies for a turn. Restore both charges by defeating a boss.

relics.name: The Dream Nail
relics.description: Unlocks occasional unique Enemy Dialogue, and new Options in some events. Holds a Powerful Secret.
relics.flavorText: Allows the wielder to cut through the veil between dreams and waking.

relics.name: The Seal of the Black Egg
relics.description: The first 2 cards you play the first 2 turns of combat are played twice.
relics.flavorText: "In wilds beyond they speak your name with reverence and regret"

relics.name: The Stag's Bell
relics.description: Right-Click to draw 6 cards. Recharge by defeating a boss.
relics.flavorText: "The sound of the bell will always call me back."

relics.name: The Stag's Bell Stand
relics.description: Right-Click to draw 6 cards, and gain [E] [E] [E] . Recharge by defeating a boss.
relics.flavorText: "Echoes down the stagways and calls me to you."

relics.name: Unbreakable Card
relics.description: The first card with Exhaust played after you shuffle your deck is not exhausted.
relics.flavorText: The smell... different. Strange, but nice. Very nice!

keywords.name: Blue Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Skill that gains Block, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Red Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Attack that deals damage, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Hallownest:fortitude
keywords.description: Fortified creatures receive 33% less attack damage.

keywords.name: Hallownest:lunacy
keywords.description: Whenever a lunatic enemy attacks or applies a debuff, a random enemy is targeted instead.

keywords.name: Hallownest:vigor
keywords.description: Vigorous creatures deal 34% more attack damage.

mods.name: Hallownest
mods.description: 3 New Acts adapting the world of Hollow Knight by Team Cherry into the Spire. Seriously, if you haven't played Hollow Knight you are missing out.
